description: Try our easy to follow Cajun Pork with Coleslaw & Sweet Corn recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork dishes,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Pork,Peanut free
name: Cajun Pork with Coleslaw & Sweet Corn Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cabbage and carrot in a bowl.
Combine yoghurt, mustard and 1 teaspoon water in a small bowl. Season with freshly ground black pepper and set aside.
Cut corn in half. Cook in a saucepan of boiling water for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain.

Spray a non-stick frying pan with oil and heat over medium heat. Sprinkle cajun spice on both sides of pork. Add pork to pan and cook for 3 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Thickly slice pork.
Place pork, corn and coleslaw on plate. Drizzle with yoghurt dressing. TIPS: For convenience, use frozen corn cobs that are already cut.
Try this dish with chicken or kangaroo fillets.
